Functions
JSX_Detect
u8 JSX_Detect(
enum INPUT_PORT port
)

Detect JSX device in the given port.

Parameters
port
enum INPUT_PORT

Input port to detect (INPUT_PORT1 or INPUT_PORT2).

Return

JSX device ID.

 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 0
–-–-–-–-–-–-–-–--
 0 0 A A A A B B
     │ │ │ │ └─┴── Number of button rows (0-3)
     └─┴─┴─┴────── Number of axis (0-15)

u8* buffer
)

port
enum INPUT_PORT

Input port to read (INPUT_PORT1 or INPUT_PORT2).
